_PIZArrayPool Struct Reference

Detailed Description

The pool of dynamic arrays.

Warning:
It is currently a very simple implementation, and should be improved ; If an array is not released, the pool will grow dramatically for each query.

Field Documentation

pthread_mutex_t _PIZArrayPool::lock

POSIX mutex.

long _PIZArrayPool::retain

Number of arrays in use.

long _PIZArrayPool::initArraySize

Memory size of new array.

PIZGrowingArray* _PIZArrayPool::cache

Pointer to the last array delivered.

PIZLinklist* _PIZArrayPool::pool

Pointer to the pool's linklist.
